## Installation

You can install the development version of stExtremes with:

```{r eval=F}
## install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("EireExtremes/stExtremes")
## Or
devtools::install_github("EireExtremes/stExtremes",
    dependencies = TRUE)
```
